sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Container, Grid, Card, CardContent, Typography, Button, Divider, Chip, Avatar, Tooltip } from '@mui/material'; import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add'; import CalendarTodayIcon from '@mui/icons-material/CalendarToday'; import ChatIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Chat'; import AssistantIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Assistant'; import DirectionsRunIcon from '@mui/icons-material/DirectionsRun'; import EmojiEventsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/EmojiEvents'; import StarIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Star'; import TrendingUpIcon from '@mui/icons-material/TrendingUp'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function Dashboard() { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Example user data const user = { name: 'Alex Runner', avatar: process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/logo192.png', streak: 7, milestone: '100 km', level: 'Pro' }; const [todayRun] = useState({ distance: '5.2 km', time: '28:15', pace: '5:25/km', calories: '420' }); const [weeklyProgress] = useState([5, 7, 0, 10, 6, 0, 8]); const [recommendations] = useState([ 'Try a tempo run this week', 'Hydrate before your morning run', 'Add a rest day after long runs', ]); return ( {/* Decorative SVGs for extra polish */} {/* Sidebar Profile Card */} {user.name} } label={`${user.streak} day streak`} size="small" sx={{ bgcolor: '#FFFBEA', color: '#B8860B', fontWeight: 600 }} /> } label={user.milestone} size="small" sx={{ bgcolor: '#F0FFF0', color: '#228B22', fontWeight: 600 }} /> Level: {user.level} {/* Main Content Cards in 2-column grid */} {/* AI Running Assistant */} AI Running Assistant Ask for personalized training tips, pacing strategies, or recovery advice! {/* Today's Run */} Today's Run {/* Running SVG + Progress Ring */} Distance {todayRun.distance} Time {todayRun.time} Pace {todayRun.pace} Calories {todayRun.calories} {/* Weekly Progress */} Weekly Progress {/* SVG Bar Chart */} Total this week: {weeklyProgress.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0)} km {/* Recommendations */} Recommendations {recommendations.length === 0 ? ( No recommendations available. ) : recommendations.map((rec, idx) => ( } label={rec} sx={{ mb: 1, bgcolor: '#F9F9F9', color: '#007AFF', fontWeight: 500, borderRadius: 2, boxShadow: '0 2px 8px #007AFF11' }} /> ))} {/* Motivational Quote */} "Every run is a step closer to your goal." Keep moving forward! {/* Footer */} © {new Date().getFullYear()} Tempo. All rights reserved. ); } export default Dashboard;
